description.english: Win scenario in Empire Scoring Mode
Win scenario in Alliance Scoring Mode
Win scenario in Ideology Scoring Mode as a Democratic government
Win scenario in Ideology Scoring Mode as a Communist government
Win scenario in Ideology Scoring Mode as a Fascist government
Win scenario in Ideology Scoring Mode as an Authoritarian government
Become a Global Superpower
Rise from Minor Nation to Superpower
Rise from Regional Nation to a Great Power
Play as Bulgaria and conquer all external claims plus Morava and Macedonia
Play as Greece and reconquer Constantinople and the Anatolian shores, the Dodecanese, Valona, and Cyprus
As Italy conquer a Mediterranean Empire taking Tunisia, Algeria, Libya, Southern France, Malta, Cyprus, and the Adriatic rim
Play as Bolivia and regain lost claimed territory from Chile and Paraguay, plus Acre from Brazil
Play as Guatemala and take control of Central American claims
Play as Persia and conquer the Azeri and Kurdish regions
Play as Turkey and conquer all regions with Turkic Culture
Play as Turkey and reconquer former Ottoman Empire territories.
Play as Germany and establish the Greater German Reich by conquering the Low Countries, Scandinavia, and Eastward to the Urals
Play as Hungary and conquer claimed regions plus Bosnia, Herzegovina, Dalmatia, and Bukovina
Play as the Kingdom of Siam and conquer claimed regions
Play as the Kingdom of Yemen and conquer claimed regions
Play as the Empire of Japan and push the Western Powers from Asia and the Pacific
Play as Mexico and conquer claimed regions in the US Southwest
